org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server.config.xml

Class RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server.config.xml.RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml

  • public class RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the RESTful server configuration object that is persisted as XML and read from XML to perform all the configuration of the RestfulDiffuserServer. Objects of this class are used by the RestfulDiffuserServerConfig, which performs the configuration.

    The main(...) method provides a utility for generating and validating the main RESTful server configuration file and the diffuser strategy configuration file. For information on using the main(...) method, run this class with the option "--help".

    java RestfulDiffuserServerConfigXml --help

    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        private static final org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER

      • loadThreshold

        private double loadThreshold
        For diffusers created through calls to the server, this is the load threshold value. the threshold for CPU loads, above which the diffuser will send the tasks to a remote diffuser, unless of course, there are no client end-points specified. When the threshold is below the load threshold, the diffuser will call the local diffuser to execute the tasks.

      • strategyConfigClassName

        private java.lang.String strategyConfigClassName
        The name of the strategy class. This gets persisted, and is passed to the persistence reader to load the strategey from the strategy file

      • strategyConfigFile

        private java.lang.String strategyConfigFile
        The name of the configuration file (XML) that holds the configuration for the strategy. This is the XML file that the persistence reader uses to load the strategy configuration.
